title: Discon
body: i was in a game as one-for-all zyra and i got booted ffrom the game. i logged back in and it never mentioned the game was disbanded but i was in the home screen and my match history didnt show that the match ever even happened. am i gonna get banned

replies.body:
If the game doesn't show up in your match history, it's possible that specific gameserver hiccuped and everyone disconnected.

I hope that helps clear up the confusion!
